name: Drought Royale
description:
Open up a few tabs or grab a couple of friends to play multiplayer! 

Game Notes:

  • Controls:
    • A/D -- Walk 
    • Space -- Jump 
    • E -- Pickup weapons 
    • G -- Drop weapons
    • M -- Open map 
    • Q -- Use health packs (*walk into health packs to pick them up*)
    • Right Mouse Click -- Use Shield
    • Left Mouse Click -- Fire (if holding weapon) 

 Created by Dalton Hutchinson, Giovanny Ospina, Josh Shoenfelt and Dustin Marino
